errors.WEBGL_CONTEXT_LOST: Your browser took too long to render the image. Please try applying less operations.
errors.WEBGL_CONTEXT_LOST_LIMIT: Your browser failed multiple times while rendering the image.

warnings.image_resized: Your image exceeds the maximum size of $1 megapixels and has therefore been resized to $2x$3 pixels.
